resources.string: Results will appear here after a successful scan using the button below
This app requires camera access to identify surrounding objects. Please click grant permissions button below if you\'d like to continue.
1. To scan your surroundings, simply point your camera to any direction and tap on the scan button near the bottom of the screen.
2. Once the objects are identified, the result will be dropped on screen just above the scan button and additionally read aloud based on your preferences in the settings section.
3. Sign in with a Google account in the settings section to leverage cloud processing and improve detection accuracy.
That\'s all for the tutorial. Please go back and enjoy!
Successfully signed in. Tap here to sign out
There was a problem signing you in
Couldn\'t sign you in due to a network problem
Your device doesn\'t have any Google accounts
